product_name: The North Face Blaze Insulated Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Blaze Insulated jacket helps keep girls warm without the weight or bulk of a heavy coat. Ripstop nylon with synthetic insulation provides protection from the cold. Ripstop nylon exterior has a Durable Water Repellant finish for water resistance that keeps her dry as she dashes home from the bus stop in a sudden rain. Lightweight synthetic insulation traps body heat without being bulky. FlashDry(TM) fabric technology speeds the removal of moisture from the skin for evaporation so she stays dry and comfortable in a wide range of conditions. 2 zippered hand pockets keep her hands warm and stow small valuables. ID tag lets you mark the jacket with her name so it never gets lost in the crowd. Jacket easily compresses for storing inside the left pocket. Bottom hem of the Blaze Insulated jacket can be cinched for a snug fit that keeps her warmer when the windchill picks up. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Blaze Insulated jacket helps keep girls warm without the weight or bulk of a heavy coat. Ripstop nylon with synthetic insulation provides protection from the cold.
